mapper.select: SELECT id, user_id as userId, order_id as orderId, courses_id as coursesId , courses_name as coursesName, standby as standby, create_id as createId, update_id as updateId, create_time as createTime, update_time as updateTime FROM language_talent.lt_order_courses WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND courses_id=#{coursesId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO language_talent.lt_order_courses ( user_id, order_id, courses_id, courses_name, create_time, update_time, course_validity_period ) VALUES ( #{userId}, #{orderId}, #{coursesId}, #{coursesName}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime}, #{courseValidityPeriod} );
